modName: Flumpkin And The Pumpkins of Power
summary: A new alchemical vendor can be found in Winterhold. It seems she is stocking something a little special.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/diQvugp.png[/img]

[b][i]A bit of fun in the spirit of Halloween[/i][/b]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4][b][/b][/size][/color][/center][color=#ff00ff][size=4][b]Description

[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff7700]Once upon a time, there was a Khajiit Alchemist, who lived amongst her fellow mages
at the College of Winterhold. Her name was Flumpkinand she spent her days pursuing
a long forgotten recipe, one which could imbue the sacred pumpkin with mighty magical effects.
Try as Flumpkin might, she could not replicate the recipe her grandmother had made many years back,
when she was but a cub.

Flumpkin’s fruitless dedication to this research did not sit well with all her peers, especially Tolfdir,
who believed she was wasting her great talent on this endeavour.
Flumpkin felt scorned by the other mages, so she decided it would be best if she was to find solace
and remove any distractions from her research. Flumpkin knew of an Ideal location, a small
cavern set into the glacial rock beneath the College, along the riverbank. Here
Flumpkin made a home in the disused storage place that once connected to the
college above and so, she spent the next 8 years living there until now,
because now, she has made a discovery.  [/color]
[center]
[youtube]0tN4SV_UbrM[/youtube][/center]

[b][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#ff7700]
The latest Skyrim Update[/color] 

[color=#ff00ff][size=4][b]Features

[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff7700]Flumpkin is a new Alchemy Trader, stocking potions, poisons, ingredients and now something a little special.
(spoiler, its Pumpkins) see screenshots for effects stats of the pumpkins. 

[/color][color=#ff7700]Flumpkin will go about her daily business in her home, but she welcomes customers day or night
and has been known to even let the odd adventurer or two get some rest in her bed if she is not using it.[/color][color=#ff7700] 

New Alchemy Skill Book (note)

[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=4][b]Installation

[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff7700]Install with NMM or manager of your choice.

[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Uninstall

[/size][/color][color=#ff7700]Uninstall with NMM or manager of your choice.

[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Compatibility

[/size][/color][color=#ff7700]Mod should be compatible with anything that does not change the area of the river below the College bridge.

[/color][color=#ff7700]This mod uses a new texture for InsanitySorrows Pumpkins, if you already have Pumpkins in your game,
you may be asked to overwrite the textures. You will have two choices:
[/color][color=#ff7700]1)     Overwrite, all pumpkins will use the new textures.
[/color][color=#ff7700]2)     Do not Overwrite, all pumpkins will use original textures.

[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Credits
[/size][/color][color=#ff7700]
InsanitySorrow – Pumpkins

[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Permissions

[/size][/color][color=#ff7700]No original content of this mod may be edited and reuploaded for publishing.






[/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=5][center]GAMING, GADGETS AND ENTERTAINMENT[/center][/size][/color][color=#ff7700][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Tah2k8Y.jpg[/img]
